name: chrome-control
description: Professional Chrome browser automation - control tabs, execute JavaScript, interact with web elements, and more
long_description:
# Chrome Browser Control Extension

A comprehensive Chrome browser automation extension for Claude Desktop that enables:

## Tab Management
- Opening and closing tabs
- Switching between tabs
- Searching tabs by title/URL

## Navigation
- Navigate to URLs
- Browser history control (back/forward)
- Page reloading

## Content & Screenshots
- Execute JavaScript in pages
- Extract HTML content
- Take screenshots (file-based)

## **NEW: Element Interaction**
- Click buttons, links, and elements
- Type text into input fields
- Extract text from elements
- Check element existence and visibility

## Features
- Isolated Chrome profile (no conflicts)
- Auto-launch Chrome with debugging
- Cross-platform support
- Professional web automation

Uses Chrome DevTools Protocol for reliable browser control.
